mapper.select: /*myPage - whishList*/ select distinct d.pl_path,a.mg_name,a.mg_period,c.PD_SALE ,SUBSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'(')+1,INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'회')-INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'(')-1)as pd_cost ,b.ea ,b.RECORD_NUM ,a.mg_num from magazine a join record b on a.mg_num=b.mg_num join PRODUCT c on a.mg_num=c.mg_num join product_image d on c.pd_num=d.pd_num ,(select MG_NUM, max(substr(pl_path,instr(pl_path,'-')+1,7)) maxdate from product_image group by MG_NUM) maxz where b.RECORD_NUM in (select whish from (SELECT whish FROM member union all select whish from group_member group by whish)where whish=#{record_num}) and d.PL_TYPE='thum' and SUBSTR(d.PL_PATH,INSTR(d.PL_PATH,'-')+1,7)= MAXZ.MAXDATE

/*myPage - cartList*/ select distinct d.pl_path,a.mg_name,a.mg_period,c.PD_SALE ,SUBSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'(')+1,INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'회')-INSTR(A.MG_PERIOD,'(')-1)as pd_cost ,b.ea ,b.RECORD_NUM ,a.mg_num,c.pd_num from magazine a join record b on a.mg_num=b.mg_num join PRODUCT c on a.mg_num=c.mg_num join product_image d on c.pd_num=d.pd_num ,(select MG_NUM, max(substr(pl_path,instr(pl_path,'-')+1,7)) maxdate from product_image group by MG_NUM) maxz where b.RECORD_NUM in (select cart from (SELECT cart FROM member union all select cart from group_member group by cart)where cart=#{record_num}) and d.PL_TYPE='thum' and SUBSTR(d.PL_PATH,INSTR(d.PL_PATH,'-')+1,7)= MAXZ.MAXDATE

/*myPage - orderList*/
select b.ORDER_NUM, b.PD_NUM, b.ORDER_DATE, b.ORDER_EA, b.ORDER_MONEY, b.ORDER_OK,b.transit_num , SUBSTR(a.MG_PERIOD,INSTR(a.MG_PERIOD,'(')+1,INSTR(a.MG_PERIOD,'회')-INSTR(a.MG_PERIOD,'(')-1) pd_cost, a.MG_NAME from order_list b join product c on b.pd_num = c.pd_num join magazine a on a.mg_num=c.mg_num where b.order_num in (SELECT DISTINCT order_num FROM sell d where d.m_num=#{m_num})
mapper.delete: delete from record where record_num=#{record_num} and mg_num=#{mg_num}
